name: ComunIP
tag_list: softphone, communicator, instant-messenger, sbc, telco, telco-2-0, integration, telecom-as-a-service, vas, isp, it
overview:
ComunIP offers products and services for real-time communication over the Internet. Besides to develop new means of media transmission, the company also optimizes the convergence of different technologies.

ComunIPÂ´s framework was designed to be flexible, allowing the creation of tailored on-demand products. As soon as the clients ask their wants, ComunIP will, rapidly, set up the necessary adjustments to present the ideal solution for that specific requirement.

In May 2010 ComunIP was acquired by Takenet - founded in 1999, Takenet was the first company in the Brazilian mobile VAS market to offer content and new technologies to carriers, handset makers and big brands.

ComunIP and Takenet together are developing solutions which combine real time communication with land and mobile telephony. This partnership represents the achievement of a big challenge: telco 2.0. Through Tangram/Takenet framework with ComunIPÂ´s voice, video and chat frameworks, new kinds of services and innovative business models will be possible.
